description: She looked so colorful, I couldn't resist drawing her. But my skill and cheap color pencil didn't help me much.
I liked the messy  mascara, with the joint, but forgot to draw smoke. :P
Her haircut looked cool and messy, but couldn't draw it properly. I am happy with the result :)
those flowers looked so pretty, I tried, but awwwww, looks abit off though, ahh! what i can do, but keep trying :)
I liked the way she looking and those frickles, i would say my result are okayish.
Was looking for an expression, found her, with a frown and a gently bitten lower lip. There's a captivating intensity to her gaze.
Samurai armor, my favorite things to draw, its pre-color, the color result is not good, hahaha, so did posted it.
while browsing in pinterest, i found them looking at each other. looks lovely.
those blindfold and horns, should have puted some colors. But i feel she looks abit off, don't know why.
my second portrait try, with color pencil, she looks good.
what i was thinking, my first drawing with my new cheap color pencil (never going to buy cheap pencil in amazon), I tried to draw her, i am
quick sketch for practice
Cracks on her face & neck with leaves crown, catch my eye
pain! hope you got the referece. Love to draw intricate details, as amature eye can't catch mistakes, Hehehe :P. love the results though.
my first drawing in the my new sketch notebook. you can see the traces of the pain drawing in the back, should have taken picture before drawing other.
my longest drawing, as I mention i liked drawing intricate details, but was too lazy and regarding while drawing this fantasy fox.
I forgot where i draw her from, was it from a youtube video or pinterest.
one of my cherish drawing, she looks so pretty, with those shades on clothes, shout out to the orginal artist, hehehe.
I am proud of this one, as i draw with no eraser, on one go.
wanted to draw a cat, but do you think the face is off, i tried to fixed it but failed, hahaha. I should take a course on drawing
button nose, quick sketch for practice
Hmmm, i brought the color pencil for this drawing, drawn it half none color part and draw rest when i got the color pencil. Have i told not to buy cheap pencil from amazon.
I liked those frickles and flowers on her, but none of them came good, Hahahah.
gloomy face, quick sketch for practice
Quick sketch, i like her subtle smile
quick sketch as well, she has long neck, hahaha
once in a while, my eye catches something other then girls ðŸ˜…. two tigers on shoulder, imagination of the geniue artist, whereas mine is dead.
quick sketch for practice, tried some bending, but ahhh.... happy acident.
Same as Lion, quick sketch for practice.
If you like drawing portrait, you should know everything about skull, heard somewhere. result!, what can i say.
I draw her because of the frickles, but as you can see, i was barely able to draws frickles, hahahah.
I liked eyes, those eyes with expresion in the original. F***!!!!!!! result ðŸ˜”
wanted to draw some scenes saw this lovely beach hut, ahhh.... i am not good at drawing, should take a course on drawing.
this girl with red scarf or something, looked so pretty, the deep red scarf. couldn't capture it though but i am happy with the result.
looks off to me don't you think.
Once of my favorite, draw her while quick figure drawing practice.
I should draw more ballerina, but was too lazy to draw her hands, hahahah.
Quick sketch, wanted to draw something different then usual
this one is also my favorite proud one, no eraser, one go, happy with the way i was able to draw her.
Didn't found any eye catching while search, just draw this one on wimp, quick sketch for practice.
wanted to draw statue, found this one, result meh!
as i drew lion, horse, owl, cat, fox, so want to draw tiger, wanted to draw realitist one but this one looks soo good, so draw it.
wanted to draw more statue, found this one, result meh!
i don't remember where i saw her.
draw her for color pencil sketch practice, her nose looks sharp, hmmmm.
liked her slight smile, those frickles, but didn't draw her half hair and eyes, why!
on series of drawing statue. I need more practice.
quick sketch, i certainly didn't use any eraser, any eraser at all but had to, on her left eye, ahhhhhh. it was off.
i draw too much girls, don't i. but for this one her shades, on the figure, looked so good.
my journey to drawing something colorful, ahhh.... it is soo off.
quick sketch, i like her flowing hair in the wind
her flowing dress, i don't even know what this dress is called or this dancing, but i liked both
i don't know what i was looking for, but out of nowhere, i found this one.
liked her innocent face, with her cozy pose, i like this one...
cute mouse or mice, chopping on the apple, when you don't care much result is much better
I messup the proportion of his body, damn it!, his leg is shorter. when you care too much you F*** things up.
